nodes.text: The Ghostfinder fleet was a fleet that fought against the larger Sith armada and managed to outmatch them long before the Galactic Civil War between the Galactic Empire and the Rebel Alliance. In 5 ABY, during the battle between the naval forces of the Galactic Empire at Jakku and the larger Defense Fleet of the New Republic, Fleet Admiral Gial Ackbar of the Republic remembered when smaller and lesser forces outmatched their enemies, and thought of the Ghostfinder fleet against the Sith armada, as well as the Mandalorians against the Galactic Republic.
The Ghostfinder fleet was first mentioned in the 2017 novel Aftermath: Empire's End, which was authored by Chuck Wendig and was the final installment of the Star Wars: The Aftermath Trilogy.
